resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

kou opened a new pull request, #12781:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12781

   Ubuntu 21.04 reached EOL at 2022-01.
   
   Ubuntu 22.04 will be released in 2022-04.

   ursa-i9-9960x: Supported benchmark langs: Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: Supported benchmark langs: C++, Java

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
Ubuntu 21.04 reached EOL at 2022-01.

See also: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12583#issuecomment-1061853850

> There are also some references to 21.04 in dev/tasks/tasks.yml, should be bump them to 21.10?
> Also, there's ci/docker/ubuntu-21.04-cpp.dockerfile.
